name: Pepsico
description: Official online ordering and home delivery website and app of Dubai Refreshment & Pepsi Dubai. People can find DRC products categorized into Carbonated Soft drinks, Aquafina, Gatorade, Lipton Ice Tea, Top Fruit Juices, Robinsons Real Fruit Juice, Teisseire Syrup, Snacks, Cakes, Ice Creams, etc. People can order anything from a range of products from the comfort of their homes, and the Pepsi team will deliver to their doorstep.

name: Living Tree
description: LivingTree connects people who raise, develop, and educate children. It helps parents, loved ones, teachers, and coaches raise children. Send alerts, manage volunteers, share messages, photos, files, calendar events, and more – all in a single, private and secure place, wherever you are. The best technology has to offer to enable schools, districts, communities, and families to partner in developing children. It includes everyone in the conversation regardless of the preferred language.
A web and mobile based school application which is easy-to-use,all-in-one online fundraising platform for school teachers, teams, clubs, and education foundation.
An Online Professional Development program that equips leaders and teachers with effective strategies that improve parent communication and create authentic family engagement.
Sell items online with the School Store
Built-in marketing and management tools

name: Busch Jaeger
description:
Control Touch transforms the office into an intelligent workplace. Whether blinds, 
lights, heating, air conditioning, door communication or scenes. Easy to remote control via a switch on the wall with the smartphone or tablet. This multifunctional remote control allows you to make adjustments later without the need for previous experience. With the help of a smartphone or tablet, all functions are easily configurable.

These innovative and high-quality movement and presence detectors by ABB/Busch-Jaeger make life more comfortable. They are alert, helpful, and efficient. And they automatically manage many tasks in every sector of the building. Indoors and outdoors. Regarding safety, you know precisely when the light is needed. And other functions, such as heating and air-conditioning, can be intelligently and reliably integrated. Busch-Watchdogs are a unique combination of design, safety, efficiency and comfort.

name: Hungama
description: Hungama.com is a leading digital entertainment company that launched a digital entertainment storefront with over 2 million pieces of content across genres and languages in music tracks, movies, videos & dialogues. Hungama Music the application will allow users to browse, search, subscribe and play the music, radio, and video of their choice on Web, Android and iOS devices.

Hungama Music client application will allow users to browse, search, subscribe and play the music, radio, and video of their choice on an iOS device. The term “Client” referred to here means Client application which will run on iOS devices unless stated otherwise. The term “Server” refers to the Hungama / Catchmedia Server to which the client will connect to access the information about the content.

As one of UAE’s leading homegrown companies and partners of the world’s most prominent brands,  The company strive to excel in everything to do as a way of life and not as a one-time milestone. For example, DRC introduced the Pepsi range of products to the UAE and has been doing the same successfully for almost 60 years.

name: Employee Service Portal
description: The Employee Service Portal (ESP) is a simple way for Transguard employees to access tools and information to support their both work and life – anywhere, anytime.

A query ticketing system enabling business units to track and respond to queries raised by employees and internal stakeholders. The system allows employees or support teams to log a question, allocate a query to the relevant team member, track the query's status, log its resolution and report on all queries.
Raise queries directly to the HR Helpdesk.

name: Life Insurance
description: The purpose of this HDFC Life website is to know about HDFC products, download product brochures, benefit Illustrations, proposal forms, claim forms, and service request forms; a customer who wants to know about the policy and products of HDFC Life Insurance fill a form in the “meet an Advisor” page, based upon the customer selected city, HDFC Advisor directly contact them and explain about the products. This site also provides a survey about insurance. So it helps HDFC track customers’ needs, and this site has Planning Tools like a child calculator and a premium calculator. In addition, customers can get the address and map direction of the selected HDFC branch by using a branch locator.

name: Toyota

For connected Toyota cars, get relevant service info to your car.

Toyota i-Connect is a one-stop intelligent solution to provide an integrated & seamless experience to all Toyota vehicle owners. It offers many features to intelligently stay connected with the customer's car, family & Toyota. It is compatible with smartwatches and voice assistants in addition to smartphones.

name: kenamental
description: This project aims to provide complaints for different products and get a reply from the products handling teams. Unlike other CMS in the market, the system records the call or customer emails. When customers send a complaint based on the product, the complaints can be allocated to different persons and tracked to closure if they find a faulty product. Admin assigns complaints to different employees according to their functionality in the organisation. Employees and Admin contain their predefined roles. They were tracking the complaint raised, resolving and generating reports.

name: 3D Secure
description: This Project is a client and server-based application which implements CA 3-D Secure. 3-D Secure is a protocol designed to be an additional security layer for online credit and debit card transactions. CA Rapid App Security provides End-user experience with Higher Security, and its Use Case is in Health Care, Finance, Retail and Automobile. It supports OAuth, OpenID and CA Advanced Authentication.
responsibilities: Implemented 3D Secure 2.0 for frictionless and cashless flow.
Created Custom Framework for 3D Secure implementation in iOS App.
Written Test Classes for MAS custom security Framework.
Done Regression Testing CA Mobile API Gateway and MAS Console web application.
